name: Contact Us Page
author: Mattias JÃ¶nsson

sections.description:
You will have a professional looking contact page in seconds. It comes with a contact form, google map, contact info fields with icons and social icons. You can replace the default contact form with the shortcode of your favorite contact form.

Get started:
1. Go to the settings page and enter your information.
2. Copy the shortcode in the settings page and paste it into a page of your choice.
3. Done! It’s that simple.
sections.installation:
Installation

Install Contact Us Page via the plugin directory or by uploading the files manually to your server.
sections.faq:
Currently no frequently asked questions.

Installation Instructions

Installation

Install Contact Us Page via the plugin directory or by uploading the files manually to your server.

short_description: Create your contact page in seconds with a contact form, map, social icons and your contact info.
